Shivah::

Shivah smirked "So you was ready to this meeting, intruder? I enjoy 
to chat a while with guys like you: braves and fools. So your name is 
Foxfingers isn't?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Foxfingers steps backward as the drones aproach. "Look, I'm no 
trouble, see,
> no trouble at all," seeing the Predacons moving toward him and 
hearing the
> threat about removing his spark the snivveling little thief draws a 
vile
> from his hip containing a reddish fluid. "One more step and we'll 
all have
> the same virus that Silver Scout is infected with." He waved it 
around
> toward the Predacon commanders, "You don't believe me?" he paused 
the usual
> dramatic pause that always fits the situation, "Scan it, you'll see 
that
> it's a sample of her mech fluid." The thief smiled as much as his 
robotic
> face could muster, "I decided to bring this along JUST IN CASE." 
His bag of
> tricks was depleted down to a few simple ploys, but as usual the 
sly little
> fox kept an ace in the hole for when things got desperate.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...>
> To: Neo Beast Wars RPG <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Monday, October 08, 2001 8:20 PM
> Subject: Sparks!
> 
> 
> > ::DrillBit/KitKat2::
> >
> > "Well Shivah, he said that he was only here to find his allies. 
Nothing
> > more."
> > DrillBit thinks a second.
> > "Honey, lets show why we are Predacons! Remove his spark!" Orders
> > DrillBit.
> > "Of course love," says KitKat, as she orders some of the drones 
to hold
> > Foxfingers while the others remove his spark.
> >
> > Two drones hold Foxfingers as another starts to extract his spark.
